documentation.title: API Overview
documentation.description: This API provides access to user and blog data.

documentation.title: Get Users
documentation.description: Returns a list of all users.

documentation.title: Get User by ID
documentation.description: Returns a single user by ID.

documentation.title: Update User by ID
documentation.description: Updates a user's information by ID.

documentation.title: Get Blogs
documentation.description: Returns a list of all blogs.

documentation.title: Get Blog by ID
documentation.description: Returns a single blog by ID.

documentation.title: Get Blogs by User ID
documentation.description: Returns a list of blogs by a specific user.
